name: Capcom Generation 3: Dai 3 Shuu Koko ni Rekishi Hajimaru
name_original: Capcom Generation 3: Dai 3 Shuu Koko ni Rekishi Hajimaru
description:
Capcom Generation 3: Dai 3 Shuu Koko ni Rekishi Hajimaru (カプコン・ジェネレーション　～第３集　ここに歴史始まる～) is a Compilation video game published by Capcom released on October 15th, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation & Sega Saturn.
Contains:
Vulgus
Son Son
HiGeMaru
Exed Exes
